title: Mastering Programming Algorithms with Multi-AI Voice Tutors

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic programming concepts and experience in designing simple algorithms
context.additional_context: Digital device-supported learning environment, focusing on enhancing non-degree adult learners' job application skills.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and implement various algorithm types (sorting, searching, optimization)
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply algorithms to real-world problems through project-based assignments
Learners understand complex algorithms with minimized cognitive load through discipline-specific voice guidance from multiple AI tutors
Learners achieve over 80% algorithm retention rate in assessments two weeks later
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
